column1: Yucheng (Chinese: 禹城; pinyin: Yǔchéng) is a county-level city located in the northwest of Shandong province
column2: China. It is administered by the prefecture-level city of Dezhou.

column1: The name of "Yucheng" means "the city of Great Yu"
column2: who is believed to be the first king of Xia Dynasty
column3: and an ancient hero specializing in fighting with flood. The county of Yucheng was set up in Tang dynasty
